text: Keith Howell Charles Allen (born 2 September 1953) is a Welsh actor, comedian, musician, author and television presenter. He is the father of British singer Lily Allen. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh comedians Category:British television directors Category:British television presenters Category:British television writers Category:People from Swansea Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh musicians Category:Welsh television actors Category:Welsh writers
title: Keith Allen (actor)
